summary.span: 支援所有 JScript 類別。

span.span: Supports all JScript classes.

summary.span: 這是所有 JScript 類別的最終基底類別。

span.span: This is the ultimate base class of all JScript classes.

summary.span: 這個類別屬於物件和函式分類。

span.span: This class belongs to the objects and functions category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父代是指令碼物件將委派要求的屬性或方法，它不會實作本身的物件。The parent is the object to which the script object delegates requests for properties or methods that it does not implement itself. 例如，當您建立利用，父代是。For example, when you create a by using a , the parent is a .

MemberSignature.Usage: scriptObject.InvokeMember (name, invokeAttr, binder, target, args, modifiers, locale, namedParameters)

param.name: name
param.span: 要叫用之成員的名稱。

span.span: The name of the member to invoke.

param.name: invokeAttr
param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，指定透過反映處理搜尋成員的方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

param.name: binder
param.span: 將型別從實質引數型別轉換成型式引數型別的物件。

span.span: An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

param.name: target
param.span: 要在其上叫用成員的物件。

span.span: The object on which to invoke the member.

param.span: 這必須是目前的指令碼物件。

span.span: This must be the current script object.

param.name: args
param.span: 物件陣列，包含要叫用的成員參數的數目、順序和型別。

span.span: An array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.

param.span: 如果沒有參數，則這是空陣列。

span.span: This is an empty array if there are no parameters.

param.name: modifiers
param.span: 陣列，其長度與 args 參數相同。

span.span: An array that has the same length as the args parameter.

param.span: 它表示中繼資料內叫用的成員之引數屬性。

span.span: It represents the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata.

param.name: locale
param.span: 提供特定文化特性或地區設定的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.

param.span: 用來正確格式化數字、日期和字串。

span.span: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.

param.name: namedParameters
param.span: 參數的陣列。

span.span: An array of parameters.

The return value of the call to the member.

summary.span: 取得指令碼物件的型別。

span.span: Gets the type of the script object.
The type of the script object.

summary.span: 建立「包裝的」物件。

span.span: Creates *wrapped* objects.

summary.span: 每個包裝物件都會包含一個成員 (欄位、屬性或方法) 的資訊，連同成員定義所在之具現化物件的複本。

span.span: Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on.

summary.span: 這樣可讓其他未包含成員的物件進行儲存，然後就像傳回自己的值一般傳回其值。

span.span: This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.

MemberSignature.Value: protected static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] WrapMembers (System.Reflection.MemberInfo member, object obj);
.method familystatic hidebysig class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] WrapMembers(class System.Reflection.MemberInfo member, object obj) cil managed
Protected Shared Function WrapMembers (member As MemberInfo, obj As Object) As MemberInfo()
protected: static cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ WrapMembers(System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^ member, System::Object ^ obj);
static member WrapMembers : System.Reflection.MemberInfo * obj -> System.Reflection.MemberInfo[]

param.name: member
param.span: 要包裝的成員。

span.span: The member to wrap.

param.name: obj
param.span: 「成員」定義所在的物件。

span.span: The object that member is defined on.

summary.span: 建立包裝物件，其中包含指定的成員與指定的物件。

span.span: Creates a wrapped object that contains the specified member together with the specified object.

returns.span: 具有包裝物件的單一元素陣列，這個物件包含成員資訊和 。

span.span: A one-element array that has a wrapped object that contains the member information and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓其他物件不包含要儲存它，然後傳回其值，就好像他們自己的成員。This method enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.

span.span: An array of wrapped objects, each of which contains member information and a copy of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓其他不包含這些成員進行儲存，然後傳回其值，如同它們是他們自己的物件。This method enables other objects that do not contain these members to store them and then return their values as if they were their own.

param.span: 包裝物件的暫時資料儲存區。

span.span: Temporary data storage for the wrapped objects.

summary.span: 建立包裝物件的陣列，這些物件包含指定的成員與指定的物件，並將結果快取至指定的資料儲存區。

span.span: Creates an array of wrapped objects that contain the specified members together with the specified object, caching the results in the specified data storage.

returns.span: 包裝物件的陣列，其中每個物件包含成員資訊和 的複本。

span.span: An array of wrapped objects, each of which contains member information and a copy of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓其他不包含這些成員進行儲存，然後傳回其值，如同它們是他們自己的物件。This method enables other objects that do not contain these members to store them and then return their values as if they were their own.
